ReadQc pipeline¶

Author:David Sims
Release:$Id$
Date:April 02, 2014
Tags:Python

The readqc pipeline imports unmapped reads from one or more fastq and performs basic quality control steps:

  1. per position quality
  2. per read quality
  3. duplicates

For further details see http://www.bioinformatics.bbsrc.ac.uk/projects/fastqc/

Individual tasks are enabled in the configuration file.

Usage¶

See Setting up a pipeline and Running a pipeline on general information how to use CGAT pipelines.

Configuration¶

No general configuration required.

Input¶

Reads are imported by placing files or linking to files in the working directory.

The default file format assumes the following convention:

<sample>-<condition>-<replicate>.<suffix>

sample and condition make up an experiment, while replicate denotes the replicate within an experiment. The suffix determines the file type. The following suffixes/file types are possible:

sra
Short-Read Archive format. Reads will be extracted using the fastq-dump tool.
fastq.gz
Single-end reads in fastq format.
fastq.1.gz, fastq2.2.gz
Paired-end reads in fastq format. The two fastq files must be sorted by read-pair.

Note

Quality scores need to be of the same scale for all input files. Thus it might be difficult to mix different formats.

Requirements¶

On top of the default CGAT setup, the pipeline requires the following software to be in the path:

Program Version Purpose
fastqc >=0.9.0 read quality control
sra-tools   extracting reads from .sra files
picard >=1.38
bam/sam files. The .jar files need to be in your
CLASSPATH environment variable.

Pipeline output¶

The major output is a set of HTML pages and plots reporting on the quality of the sequence archive

Example¶

Example data is available at http://www.cgat.org/~andreas/sample_data/pipeline_readqc.tgz. To run the example, simply unpack and untar:

wget http://www.cgat.org/~andreas/sample_data/pipeline_readqc.tgz
tar -xvzf pipeline_readqc.tgz
cd pipeline_readqc
python <srcdir>/pipeline_readqc.py make full

Code¶

pipeline_readqc.runFastqc(infiles, outfile)¶

convert sra files to fastq and check mapping qualities are in solexa format. Perform quality control checks on reads from .fastq files.

pipeline_readqc.loadFastqc(infile, outfile)¶

load FASTQC stats.

pipeline_readqc.collectFastQCSections(infiles, section)¶

iterate over all fastqc files and extract a particular section.

pipeline_readqc.buildFastQCSummaryStatus(infiles, outfile)¶

load fastqc status summaries into a single table.

pipeline_readqc.buildFastQCSummaryBasicStatistics(infiles, outfile)¶

load fastqc summaries into a single table.

pipeline_readqc.publish()¶

publish files.

pipeline_readqc.build_report()¶

build report from scratch.

pipeline_readqc.update_report()¶

update report.
